headline: Is Campbell Soup Now a Value Opportunity After a 32% Slide in 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether Campbell's stock is finally cheap enough to consider or if it is a classic value trap, you are in the right place to unpack what the numbers really say about its worth. After sliding around 0.6% over the last week, roughly 9.7% in the last month, and a hefty 32.0% year to date, Campbell's price moves are signaling that the market has sharply reset its expectations. Recent headlines have focused on shifting consumer demand, with investors debating how resilient...
